channel.desc: Channel where the message to get reactions for was posted.

file_comment.desc: File comment to get reactions for.

full.desc: If true always return the complete reaction list.

timestamp.desc: Timestamp of the message to get reactions for.

errors.file_comment_not_found: File comment specified by `file_comment` does not exist.
errors.file_not_found: File specified by `file` does not exist.
errors.message_not_found: Message specified by `channel` and `timestamp` does not exist.
errors.no_item_specified: `file`, `file_comment`, or combination of `channel` and `timestamp` was not specified.
